The vinyl box set contains 4 discs, eight sides packed with 26 songs (15 acoustic & 11 electric) from the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s five-night, sold out NYC performances from 2010.

---

Today marks the release of Wiser for the Time, the new live album from Southern jam rockers The Black Crowes. The album features 26 songs from the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s five-night run of shows at the Best Buy Theater in New York City, Oct. 31 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Nov. 6, 2010. Fifteen of the songs are acoustic and all feature North Mississippi All-Stars frontman Luther Dickinson (who recorded and toured with the Crowes from 2007-2010) on lead guitar.

Interestingly, the Crowes are only making the album available in vinyl and digital download formats. It will cost $19.99 on iTunes and $69.98 for a special four-record vinyl box set. Ã¢â‚¬Å“Wiser for the TimeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ is the Black CrowesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ first official release since the acoustic collection Croweology came out in August 2010.
